## Projects planned for the year:

### 1. Decentralised Autonomous Organisation:

We will create a DAO for the LBS Blockchain Organisation on Ethereum blockchain

### 2. Workshops:

We are planning to host Tech workshops focussed on coding smart contracts, DAO creation and many more!

### 3. Events:

We will conduct several Blockchain events in collaboration with companies and other Institutions!
